Quote: Stay away from what might have been and look at what will be.
Author: Marsha Petrie Sue

Quote: If a man does not make new acquaintances as he advances through life, he will soon find himself left alone. A man, sir, should keep his friendship in a constant repair.
Author: Samuel Johnson

Quote: The man who trusts men will make fewer mistakes than he who distrusts them.
Author: Camillo Benso, Count of Cavour

Quote: The greatest obstacle to connecting with our joy is resentment.
Author: Pema Chödrön

Quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
Author: Benjamin Franklin

Quote: It is not enough to have a good mind; the main thing is to use it well.
Author: René Descartes

Quote: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself again and again.
Author: Joseph Campbell

Quote: God made me fast. And when I run, I feel His pleasure.
Author: Eric Liddell

Quote: By living deeply in the present moment we can understand the past better and we can prepare for a better future.
Author: Thích Nhất Hạnh

Quote: If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart.
Author: Nelson Mandela

Quote: There are no strangers here; Only friends you haven't yet met.
Author: William Butler Yeats

Quote: Beauty is a pattern that our minds recognize, but don't fully understand.
Author: Me
